content: total for the tiny pumpkin stop increasing here for the medium pumpkin increase one more round and for the big pumpkin increase two more rounds round 6 chain 3 fpdc in the same stitch fpdc in the next 6ix stitches two fpdc in the next stitch bpdc in the next stitch two fpdc in the next stitch fpdc in the next six this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no derivative works 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa 3/4 stitches two fpdc in the next stitch and bpdc in the next stitch five times slip_stitch in the beginning chain three to join the round round 7 chain 3 fpdc in the same stitch fpdc in the next eight stitches two fpdc in the next stitch bpdc in the next stitch two fpdc in the next stitch fpdc in the next eight stitches two fpdc in the next stitch and bpdc in the next stitch five times slip_stitch in the beginning chain three to join the round making your pumpkin tall chain 3 fpdc in all fpdc of the previous round and bpdc in all bpdc of the previous round for the small you will do the making tall round five times for the medium you will do the making tall round seven times and for the large you will do the making tall round 9 times decreasing rounds drnd 1 chain 3 fpdc decrease over the next two sts fpdc in the next 2 2 6 stitches fpdc decrease over the next two sts bpdc in the next stitch fpdc decrease over the next two sts fpdc in the next 2 2 6 stitches fpdc decrease over the next two sts bpdc in the next stitch five times slip_stitch in the beginning chain three to join the round drnd 2 continue doing a fpdc in the first and last fpdc of each segment and a bpdc in each bpdc last drnd ch3 fpdc decrease over the next two sts bpdc in the next post 6 times sl st in the beginning chain 3 to join round finish off leaving a long tail thread with a yarn needle sew the bottom shut then sew to the top and back down to the bottom two times to make it more pumpkin shaped finish off stem using brown yarn this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no derivative works 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa 4/4 for the small pumpkin attach with a slip_stitch around on of the fpdc from round 2 single_crochet in each of the six fpdc on from round 2 join with a slip_stitch single_crochet around three more times bind off sew
